alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:50AM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Lake County below 11000 Feet, the western Mosquito Range and east Lake County above 11000 Feet, the Upper Rio Grande Valley, and western Chaffee County between 9000 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
